about_the_game:
No more expensive mo-cap gears! AvaKit IS HERE!

AvaKit, which finishes its CBT(closed beta test) starts an Early Access in Steam!
VTubers can start their real-time motion capture of their VRM files through AvaKit.

Just a single camera is okay to start.

The only thing to start AvaKit is just a single, common webcam.
No iPhone or Leapmotion needed.
SINGLE CAMERA and AvaKit are only things that you need to become a VTuber.
Then hand, arm, iris, facial expression, and body tracking is available in AvaKit.
Any type of camera - laptop webcam, smartphone, external webcam - is okay for us.

Easy to start your own live-streaming

What you need to do before start is so simple:

(1) Connect your camera
(2) Start the AvaKit
(3) and implement two types of calibration.

After these three procedures, you can enjoy our complete tracking solution.
If you have your own VRM files, you can change the avatar model and start live-streaming.
(AvaKit officially supports the plugins of OBS Studio - Spout2 Capture & Syphon)

We provide you default VRM character, Rua-chan!

You can try features of AvaKit with our cute mascot characeter, 'Rua-chan'.
Also, AvaKit only supports the VRM file for 3DVTubers currently,
but we plan to expand our spectrum to Live2D model.
Whenever there are any issues or difficulties related to playing AvaKit,
please let us know through our official .
Newcomers are always welcome! 😜

Why you have to choose AvaKit

AvaKit provides the optimized features to livestream in YouTube and Twitch for VTubers.
Currently, the major features that AvaKit supports are as follows.

  • Easiest and fastest real-time facial expression, hands, body tracking to start
  • Microphone-based lip sync (both audio-based and video-based are available)
  • High-quality rendering through AvaKit pipeline(shader applying other than MToon)
  • Shape key implementation through hot key registration - blendshape, costume, hair, etc.
  • Precise setting related to tracking parameters and avatar movement available
  • Position, rotation and size modification of avatar available
  • Prop import (Available to import PNG file as a prop)
  • Chroma key - green background, Spout2 Capture and Syphon Client available
  • Various backgrounds, lightings, particle effects, and beauty filters
  • NDI support available
  • Available both on Windows and MacOS!

There are much more features that AvaKit wants to show you. We really tried hard to develop.
We are always open to your suggestions, so please feel free to say to us at our !

Features that will be updated

Also, features that are planned to be developed through previous tests are as follows.

  • Interaction plugin between VTuber and viewers by linking with Twitch and YouTube
  • Sticker and illustration auto-generation
  • Closet mode(This will help you change your costumes easily without shape key registration)
  • More various rendering filter(shader) types
  • Inner camera for avatar selfie like VRChat
  • ...and many more through our exclusive plugins!

How to make a contact with dev

There is our .
Also, we are consistently our development procedures through our official Twitter account,
so you can also communicate with us through this channel.
We look forward to communicating with you!

Credit

There are several 3D asset presets in AvaKit for throwing-object-feature.
Thanks for your contribution.
@FelineEntity @zuzu @RenAtlach

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Big Sur
  • Processor: Intel core that can run at 2.5GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: camera(webcam, smartphone, etc.) required to implement motion tracking
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Monterey 12.6.3
  • Processor: M1/M2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: camera(webcam, smartphone, etc.) required to implement motion tracking

short_description: AvaKit: all-in-one streaming app for VTubers. You can start real-time mo-cap with just a single camera. High-quality rendering with 100% lilToon support, perfect sync, and various contents AvaKit prepared for you will take you to the awesome virtual world.
